## ginkgo-cli note delete

Delete a note

```
ginkgo-cli note delete <id> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help               help for delete
      --namespace-delete   delete all notes in the namespace
      --yes                skip confirmation prompt for namespace delete
```

```
      --config string      path to config file (yaml|toml)
```
